editor.label: Continuous Integration - Subversion
editor.description: A schedule that is enabled for ElectricSentry continuous integration with Subversion.

formElement.label: Repository:
formElement.documentation: The Subversion repository to use. It can take two forms: A single, specific path. Multiple depot paths, separated them by a new line.

formElement.label: Revision (output property path):
formElement.documentation: Property where the last revision number will be stored.

formElement.label: Quiet time minutes:
formElement.documentation: The number of minutes of no check-in activity required before launching the procedure.

formElement.label: Enabled for ElectricSentry:
formElement.documentation: Enable for continuous integration monitoring by ElectricSentry.
